name: .WIXMST File Extension
summary: Learn about .WIXMST files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Transform file created by the WiX toolset, a Windows installer development utility; produced to represent the difference between a pair outputs or XML outputs; contains the MsiFileHash table that organizes the differences; appears in XML form.

content: NOTE: The Pyro tool included in the WiX Toolset uses the .WIXMSP file and one or more WIXMST files to produce a .MSP file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
